97.comment: Has a script that is called on button press

163.comment: A simple box morph. A really blue one. Its amazing what you can build out of simple boxes.... Who needs stars when you got blue rectangles!

338.comment: An OData browser. You can browse the metadata of an OData source with this component and do queries to entities and browse the results.
